description:
Kinjirou Kitaeda is one of the rivals of Maki Aikawa, he`s the leader of a gang called "The man in black justice league".
Kinjirou can look badass, but he`s homossexual, he`s boyfriend is a big guy called Nagato, that always punching the girls who get close to "Kin".
name: Kitaeda Kinjirou
